body:
Comment 17: 
hmm, I'm not so sure any more. at the exact moment i clicked "Save Changes" then, my
looping test runner died after several successful runs with this stack trace.

http://paste.ubuntu.com/5676399/

here is the disassembly of scanblock, the function it died inside:
http://paste.ubuntu.com/5676404/

re-opening until i can decide that this is not an issue.
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
